Memorandum that the second dai of Decembre the yer' et cetera lxxviij yeris It is appointit and
accordit betuix Rob stevynson the ayr of quhilum William stevynson and William
blindsel eldar forspekar' and factour for him on the ta part And Donald pyot on
the tothir part be the avise of the Aldirman and the Official / that is tosay that the
said Rob stevynson sal entyr til a buthe liand in the gallougate quhilk
was debatabil betuix the saidis parteis / at Witsonday nixt tocum in the yer'
of god M iiijC lxx and nyne yeris withoute ony impediment or demand of the
said Donald or ony in his name /. And that the said Donald pyot sal haf the
mail of the buthe of the said terme of Witsonday / and the mail of the
terme of mertymes next thareftir folowand allanerly for al vthir clame that
the said Donald had or may haf to the said buthe in tyme tocum

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem quarto die Decembris
anno predicto /

quo die cristinus carnifex in amerciamento pro perturbacio cuiusdam cristiane / vnde iniungitur
eidem ad Dauid dimidium li' cere ad missam sancti sanguinis et cetera

Eodem die Dauid gethan amerciatur quia negavit facere compotum et solucionem cuiusdam papiri compoti
presentati per Johannem balcromby ex parte fratris eius alexandri balcromby procuratorio nomine eiusdem

Item the same dai the aldirman and balyeis be the decrete of the court chargit
Richard hil til answer' til patrik androsonis clame of xvij punye of fute
vel and xiiij punye lentirware this dai viij dais as law wil

Johannes Wricht and alexander lammynton ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem prout
comparuit fuit per assisam Et idem Johannes in alio amerciamento quare intrauit domum andree lammyn
ton tempore dicte perturbacionis et perturbavit familiam eiusdem vnde assisa ordinauit
prefatum Johannem in partem emende deliberare j li' cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis et
xij d' dicto alexandro et cetera

Item the same dai maistir William anffra producit their witnes' and prefis vndirwritin
in the caus movit betuix him and Richard hil / quhilkis witnes the gret aith
sworn in presence of the partiis deponis ilke man be him self in this maner folouande

John' stevyn the first witnes sworn as said is and examinyt deponis and sais
that Wil of hil vmquhile the son of Richard hil sayde til him into Ree that
he had of maistir William anffrais gudis pakkit in a canves iiijor C lentirwar'
and a peis' of quhite clath he wate nocht how mekil / bot that the said William tald
him quhen he was sellane the clath that it wes the said mastir Williamis
And he says that he knawis / the lentrinwar' was sald in Danskyn for twa
pruys' merkis the hundre / And how the clath wes sald / he wate nocht .

Wil necolson the second witnes deponis be his aith that he knawis nocht
how mekil quhilum Wil of hil had of mastir William anffrais gudis
bot that Wil of hil sayde til him / that he had lentirwar' and clath of the saide
maistir Williamis / And that he saw the lentirwar' sald in Danskyn for
ij pruys' merkis the hundre / and of thaim gevin to bate

Androw prat the thrid witnes sais that he pakit til the said mastir William in
his chavmer certane lentirwar' / futevel and clath in a poke / bot he knew
nocht how mekil thar wes / bot be the Rehers of Wille anffray / quhilk
sayde til him / quhen he inquirit tharof / that thar wes vC lentirwar' / iijxx of
futevel and mare / and xv eln' of quhite clath / And forthir he knawis
nocht bot that it wes gude thing

Richard of hil producit be the said mastir William as ferd witnes sworn
and examnyt sais / that he knawis nocht of the said matir forthir than his sonis
buke proportis / that is to say that the said quhilum Wil of hil his son had of
the said mastir Williamis and sald xiij reis eln' of quhite clath / the dusan for
vj s' eln and the od eln for v s'

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem vijo die
Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxxviij

Quo die magister Willelmus anffray constitu
it Dauid meignes et Willelmum blindsel iuniorem coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores
in causa mota et dependen' inter ipsum et Ricardum hil ad agendum et defendendum pro
eo prout Jura volunt Ipso promittens de Rato et cetera

Alexander chavmyr de murchil plegius legalis pro Archibaldo Rate quod Alexander
leil erit indempnis de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Item dictus Alexander de camera deuenit plegius Andree scherar' preposito tanquam deputato vicecomitatis
in hac parte / pro Alexandro liel ad subeundum legem comunem et eedem periturus pro morte Da
uid Donaldson seruitoris Archibaldi Rate casu quo ipsum Dauid contingerit disce
dere de lesione et wlneracione eiusdem per dictum alexandrum liel perpetratum et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor inuenit Dauid colison plegium pro eo responsurus et Juri
pariturus ut supra / pro eo quod dictus archibaldus asseruit ipsum artem et partem habuisse
de lesione prefati Dauid

Item Alexander liel accusatus de perturbio huius ville in lesione Dauid Donaldson predicti
de hoc posuit se in voluntate prepositi et balliuorum vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento et cetera

Item eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor accusatus similiter per prepositum et balliuos de iniusta
perturbacione huius burgi tanquam artem et partem habens de lesione Dauid Donaldi
negauit / et quitus factus fuit per assisam ex purgacione et Juramento suo fact'
iuxta ordinacionem eiusdem assise cuj intererant Andreas rede de badfo
thel Dauid symson Johannes Wormot thomas prat Dauid mathei Willelmus hay
macolmus mowat thomas malisson alexander scrogis thomas scrogis et Willelmus andree

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem ix die
Decembris anno Dominj et cetera lxxviij /

quo die quidam forsithe et Willelmus murra accu
sati de iniusta lesione et wlneracione Johannis Wilson et capcione certorum bonorum
ab eodem sub nocte posuerunt se in vocate prepositi et ballivorum de premissis / quare quilibet
ipsorum adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
mensis Decembris anno predicto

The same dai the aldirman and balyeis has assignit til Androw cant with
his awne consent tocum before thaim in the tolbuthe on monondai viij dais
next eftir the law day eftir yule nest tocum bringand with him ane suf
ficiant man in ilke hand to mak gude faith / that the aith that he sal
mak that dai anent the payment made as he sais of xxvj s'
clamyt on him be Johne of lammynton on the behalf of his wif
is leil and trew / And failyeand tharof tobe condampnyt in the said some'

Item the same dai Wil moyses oft tymes callit be Dauid Duncan seriande
til answere to the borgh strekit on him be thom chapman as for the second
day of proces' comperit nocht / quharfor the seriand was chargit to distres him
and towarn him til the nixt lachful day as to the thrid day of proces'

the said dai Wat pyot constitute thom chapman his procuratour to folou Rob
senyour of xx stan' of swyngil lynt / iij xx li' of wax vj les ij stan'
of hekkil lynt and of j barrel of pes' / as he that bocht the saidis gudis fra
him and todo and defend for him as law wil / promittand ferm and stabil et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xv die Decembris anno Domini et cetera lxxviij /

quo die
Alexander stokar' adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione vxoris henrici bawne
in verbo et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum virorum

In curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xvj die mensis
predicti / Jacobus Douglas nauta posuit se in voluntate de amerciamento curie pro perturbacione
eiusdem curie loquendo viciose vxori philipis symson Et idem Jacobus in amerciamento pro inius
ta perturbacione dicte vxoris / et ipsa amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Jacobi prout repertum fuit per assisam
vnde iniungitur eidem Jacobo ad dandum dimidium libre cere ad missam sancti sanguinis et cetera

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the xviij dai of December forsaid It
wes determyt and deliuerit be ane assise Adam of crafurd forspekar / that
in sa fer as patrik androson may preve with sufficiant witnes' that he samo
ny lentirwar' and futevel as he deliuerit til quhilum wil of hil into ree /
Richard hil salbe responale til the said patrik tharfore

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xixo die Dece
mbris anno predicto /

quo die Cristiana hukstar' per concessionem suam amerciatur pro iniusta empcione
piscium et aliorum bonorum antequam presentatur in foro aut deseruiatur burgensibus ville et cetera

Johannes lammynton posuit se in voluntate prepositi pro perturbacione curie scandilose loquendo contra
Alexandrum trail

The xxij dai of Decembre the yer' forsaid / the Aldirman and consale has assignit
til William blindsel eldar friday eftir the law day eftir yule nixt tocum togif
him answer anent ane half nettis fisching of the furdis pertening til quhilum Wil
liam voket / to the quhilk day thai haf ordand toger warn thom of marris
procuratouris gif thar be ony / and al vthiris haffand clame to the said fisching
toschaw thare richtis and documentis the said day

Item the same dai the balyeis has ordand Rob senyour toanswere to the borgh strekit
on him be Wat pyot on the law day eftir yule nixt tocum as law wil et cetera

Item anent the debate movit be John' stevynson ane of the ballies againis
Dauid mathoson for four' mettis of salt / the quhilkis the said Dauid
had wrangwisly intromettit with and ressauit as Johne stevynson allegit
/ the aldirman and consel riply avisit has fundin and deliuerit / that the said John'
stevynson the balye has reson' for him and aucht tobe payt and content of
the saidis iiijor mettis of salt et cetera

Jacobus dei gracia Rex Scotorum vniuersis et singulis ligiis et subditis nostris ad quorum noticias
presentes littere peruenerint salutem . Quia intellexius quod burgenses et mercatores burgi nostri de
Abirdene qua magna dampna et incommoda hactenus perpessi sunt ob exportacionem
lane pellium et corriorum extra vicecomitatum nostrum de Abirdene In contrarium priuelegiorum et
libertatis dictorum burgensium in fraudem nostre magne custume dicti burgi Nos
igitur acceden' et perpenden' infrictionem dicte libertatis et huiusmodi dampna nostra et
dictorum nostrorum burgensium Commisimus et presencium tenore commitimus preposito ballivis et
burgensibus dicti burgi nostri quj pro tempore fuerint eorumque deputatis libe
ram facultatem et plenariam potestatem eschaetandum et ad vsum nostrum
appropriandum et capiendum huiusmodi bona lanas pelles coria sic extra dictum
vicecomitatum et libertatem dicti burgi abducta seu imposterum forsitan ab
ducenda absque solucione nostre custume De quibusquid bonis eschae
tatis concessimus et presencium tenore concedimus dictis burgensibus burgi nostri de
Abirdene dimidietatem eschaete eorundem pro eorum laboribus supertibus et
expensis faciendis circa eorum eschaetacionem Aliam vero dimidietatem
dicte eschaete ad nos importare et de eisdem bonis annuatim in
nostro scaccario compotarum reddere tenebuntur prepositus et ballivi burgi
supradicti Quo circa vniuersis et singulis ligiis et subditis nostris quorum
interest vel interesse poterit stricte percipiendo mandamus quietus dictis prepo
sito ballivis et burgensibus dicti burgi eorumque ministris et seruitoribus
in omnibus et singulis eschaetacionem dictorum bonorum concernentibus et de
portacionem eorundem ad vsus nostros vt premittitur prompte respondeant pare
ant et intendant et quod in contrarium presencium nullatenus deuenire presumant
temporibus pro futuris sub omni pena que competere poterit in hac parte / presen
tibus pro nostra voluntate duraturum Datum sub magno Sigillo nostro
apud Edinburgh nono die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadri
gentesimo quinquagesimo octauo Et Regni nostri vicesimo secundo

Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta per eosdem in pretorio eiusdem viijo die Januarij anno Domini
mo iiijco lxxviijuo

Quo die Robertus talyour conuictus per assisam adiudicatus fuit in duobus
amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi Wenton et in alio pro perturbio Johannis ramsay
Et idem Johannes in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbauit dictum robertum et emendabit alter alteri ad
visum proborum virorum vnde ordinatum fuit per assisam / quod de cetero si contigerit ipsorum aliquem
talem perturbacionem seu brigam contra alterum facere per quam conuictus fuerit / soluet xl s' ad voluntatem balliuorum

Die ixa mensis et annj predictorum In curia balliuorum subscripte brasiatrices amerciatur pro
fractione communis ordinacionis in propinacione lagene ceruisie pro xij d' per concessiones proprias
videlicet Adam crafurd ex parte vxoris sue / vxor Roberti Kintor Relicta thome culan vxor
alexandri alanson / vxor Willelmi Douglas vxor thome gillespy Agneta baxtar Relicta
Johannis Duncanj vxor Andree branch Nicholaus baxtar pro vxore / Sponsa thome gardner
W moyses nomine sue sponse vxor Johanne sincler' vxor andree goldsmyth ada cadiou

the aldirman at the ordinance of the consale has chargit the saidis broustaris and al
the lave that nane of thaim in tyme cuming sel xij d' ail vndir the pain of viij s' vnforgevin
for the first and second tyme thai be conuict and of rasing of the vnlawis of before And
at the thrid tym thare caldron' or lede salbe brocht to the merket cors and the bothum
strekin oute and the forfautaris tobe excludit fra the craft for a yer'

Januarij anno quo supra

Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent
inferius quorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento propter absenciam videlicet Willelmus de Kairnequhin
Alexander scot in mar' Alanus de clat Alexander scherar' in balvany Willelmus andree in
Kairnquhochil Johannes de panton' de petmethen Johannes morison in Dunbanan Johannes meldrum
Alexander sanchar iunior Andreas gilquhom Johannes roberti in strabolgy Walterus curtiar in
terra Willelmus scherar in strabolgy Johannes Dauyson in colly Jacobus leche Robertus Duncan
son Johannes Donaldson Walterus alanson alexander Watson andreas brekach

Inquisicionis nomina Dauid colison Dauid symson gilbertus vaus alexander howison
Johannes Wormot Willelmus blindsel iunior Johannes Waus Dauid menyes Adam
de crafurd gilbertus morison Willelmus malisson Alexander scrogis Alexander hay Willelmus
blindsel senior macolmus mowet et Johannes stewart Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes
stokar patruus Alexander stokar latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera de quadam terra cum pertinenciis
Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie burgi de abirdene ex boreali parte vici eiusdem inter terram Johannis de
catnes ex parte orientali ex vna et terram quondam Ade litstar ex parte occidentali partibus ex altera
Et de vna particata sive li Rig terre iacentis ex parte boreali de le crabstane inter croftum
Johannis Kintor ex parte occidentali et croftum quondam Richardi Kintor ex parte orientali Et quod dictus Alexander est
legittimus et propinquior heres et cetera et legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinencijs / videlicet nunc per annuum xx s'
et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et dicta perticata terre valet nunc per annum ij s' solut' annuo redditu inde
debito et tantum tempore pacis Et tenetur in capite de domino Rege per seruicium burgale Et quod dicta
terra nunc est in manibus cristiane bercla Relicte quondam dicti Johannis racione coniuncte infeodacionis pro tempore
vite sue Et quod dicta perticata terre nunc existit in manibus Regis legittime per se ipse a tempore obiti
dicti quondam Johannis per spacium vnius mensis uel eocirca in defectu veri heredis et cetera

Eodem die Robertus blindsel accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu
duorum solidorum sibi annuatim et hereditarie debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam
terra cum pertinencijs iacente in li grene huius burgi inter terram henrici poilson ex boriali parte
ex vna et terram Andree balluny ex parte ex parte australi partibus ex altera Ad quam accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam primo die
processus testibus Roberto senyour Johanne portar et philippo Dunbrek seriando .

Actio inter alexandrum hay et gilbertum morison cum consensu parcium differtur ad diem veneris
sub spe concordie

Item eodem die comparens personaliter in pretorio coram preposito Cristiana merchand fatebatur se quiete
clamasse et exonerasse ac tenore presentis scripti quieteclamat et exonerat Dauid ego
burgensem huius burgi de vniuersis et singulis contractibus clameis et condicionibus que dicta
cristiana habuit seu monere poterat contra eundem Dauid occasione quacumque
testibus Adam crafurd macolmo mowet Jacobo robertson thoma knox et aliis.

xv die Januarij anno et cetera lxxviii comparens in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis matheus
fichet tutor Johannis stevyn filij et heredis quondam Ricardi stevyn burgensis huius burgi cum
potestate substituendi ut asseruit / substituit et ordinavit Dauid colison Alexandrum chavmer vnium bal
liuorum huius burgi et Johannem colison' filium et apparentem heredem dicti Dauid coniunctim et
diuisim suos procuratores et deputatos speciales in omnibus et singulis actionibus clameis
et querelis dictum puerum concernentibus et eundem constituen' ex parte eiusdem Ad agendum
et defendendum in premissis prout Jura volunt Ipso promittens de Rato in presencia dicti Johannis stevin
et testium subscriptorum videlicet petrum Kymdy Willelmi blindsel seniorum gilberti morison et aliorum

Eodem die gilbertus morison ex vna et Alexander hay partibus ex altera penes actionem
debatabilem inter eosdem submiserunt se ad amicabilem composicionem infrascriptorum videlicet Andree
scherar prepositi magistri Johannis hay Rectoris de croudane Alexandri de camera de murchil
Dauid colison Alexandri rede dominj Dauid vaus curati de abirdene Ade crafurd
et Dauid menyes / ad determinandum et deliberandum dictam actionem inter huic et festum puri
ficacionis beate marie virginis proximo futuro Et si super determinacionem premissam dicte partes concor
dare nequant comparebunt in pretorio coram preposito et consulibus die lune proximo post predictum
festum purificacionis ad subeundum determinacionem eorundem vt Jura volunt et cetera
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta ibidem per ballivos eiusdem xviij die Januarij anno et cetera lxxviij

Quo die Thomas scrogis in curia per Robertum blindsel prelocutorem suum obtulit se ad faciendum
et perimplendum omnes condiciones et contractus initas inter ipsum thomam scrogis et thomam chepman
tunc in curia presentem iuxta visum virorum presencium tempore huiusmodi condicionum et contractuum

Eodem die Andreas cant manens in logy quj alias manucepit probare in hac curia
solucionem suam xxvj solidorum clamat' per Johannem lammynton ex parte vxoris sue sponse
quondam Andree galty secundum tenorem acti desuper fact' / Sepe vocatus ad comparendum et supra non comparuit
vnde hora diei legittima expectata et dicto Johanne plegium porrigen' quod deuenit ad cla
meum suum nomine quo supra de dicta summa / prefatus Andreas cant adiudicatur in amerciamento quia defecit
in probacione predicta ad satisfaciendum dicto Johanni nomine sue sponse de huiusmodi xxvj solidis
infra terminum Juris secundum tenorem acti inde confecti / et hoc in defectu eiusdem andree non comparentis
nunc probantis dictam solucionem prout tenebatur et cetera

Die xixa mensis Januarij predicti / prepositus et balliui assignauerunt Alexandro menyes nomine Alexandri
rolland hodie ad octo dies ad producendum coram eis in curia huius burgi certificacionem suffi
cien' quod causa prosecuta per magistros gilbertum hay de vry et Johannem hay rectorem
de croudane ex parte Ade hervy contra et aduersus Alexandrum rolland et Alexandrum menyes
prelocutorem suum est aban' cum consensu parcium coram Judice ecclesiastico in consistorio Abirdonensis finita
et Juridice determinata

Eodem die thomas litstar primo die sepe vocatus responsurus plegio per thomam chapman
super eum extenso in terminis wlgaribus subscriptis videlicet I thom chepman strekis a borch in
your hand Duncan of straloch seriand / that Thom litstar bocht fra me ane pype of waid
of vj bollis and gif it wantit I suld mak him samekil / and gif it was mare it
wes myne / and he suld haf cumin on the morn eftir at ix houris and resauit his wad
and pait me xj li' and wrangis that he dois it nocht et cetera Non comparuit / quare precipitur dicto seriendo
leuare districtum et premunire eundem ad comparendum in curia huius burgi die Jouis xxj die
instantis mensis responsurus ut supra tanquam secundo die huius placiti

In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxj die Januarij anno predicto megota coly conuicta per assisam
adiudicatur in ijbus amerciamentis in vno pro iniusta perturbacione Relicte quondam thome alanson et in alio quia
perturbavit Alexandrum trail in verbo

Eodem die prepositus et ballivi ex decreto curie ordinauerunt thomam litstar responsurus ple
gio super eum per thomam chepman porrecto vt patet supra in vigilia purificacionis
beate virginis marie proximo futuro et cetera
